hero.description1: Abdul-Ali Al-Ajmi Company has specialized since its establishment in 1980 in the field of road and bridge construction and maintenance, infrastructure, worksite preparation, real estate plans development, and land transport services. , the border guards, the Ministry of Municipal and Rural Affairs, the private real estate sector, and others, and the Abdul Ali Al-Ajmi Company was known as a major company in the field of road construction throughout the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
hero.description2: TAbdul Ali Al-Ajmi Company was established in 1980 and has taken its main headquarters in the city of Riyadh and has expanded its business and established branches in Hofuf and Jaffa.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We provide innovative and reliable solutions across multiple fields.

items.title: Transport on Roads
items.desc: Specialized in transporting goods and machinery in challenging terrains.

items.desc: Main activity focused on road construction and long-term maintenance.

items.desc: Commercial and residential building construction services.

items.title: Petroleum Services
items.desc: Including the maintenance of oil & gas wells and related works.

items.title: Surface Treatment & Road Safety
items.desc: Important services for treating asphalt surfaces and ensuring safety.

items.title: Electricity Works
items.desc: Implementation of electrical projects across various sectors.

items.title: Rental Equipment & Heavy Vehicles
items.desc: Provision of a fleet of heavy and light equipment for rent.
